name: Space Compact (Ludum Dare 42)
description:
SPACE COMPACT - A Game for Ludum Dare 42 (48 hour Compo)

CONTROLS: (if nothing is happening, click in the game window to refocus)
up arrow: accelerate
down arrow: repulser shield
left and right arrows: rotate ship (or move left and right inside space station)
spacebar: shoot and dock at stations

You're an outer space entrepreneur! (spacetrepreneur?) Use your pitifully small cargo hold to deliver crates from station to station. Try not to get crushed by totally-original-and-non-copyright-infringing asteroids, and avoid getting shot down by space pirates. Use your lasers and repulser shield to defend yourself.  Survive for as long as you can and make bank! After every 5 full deliveries, you'll get a free hull point repair to help keep your ship in the fewest number of pieces possible.
